name: Firoz Raja
introduction: I am an experienced and results-oriented professional with over two decades in technical consulting, and have demonstrated agility. I have a proven track record of delivering effective solutions in dynamic and multicultural settings. My expertise encompasses capital investment proposal development, project development, and facility planning in both the renewable and fossil fuel-based energy sectors. A committed learner with robust business acumen, I am currently engaged in advancing sustainable practices with Neste Singapore.
top_3_advice: Any action that reduces climate impact on our planet matters. Start today even if it means starting small!
Sustainability can mean slightly different things to different audiences. As long as you tell your story with data and a message, it will be well-received.
Keep learning, as there could be numerous ways to fight climate change.
how_can_help: Here is how I am happy to help The Matcha Initiative website users: 1. Offering tips and advice based on past experiences working with the world's largest liquid renewable fuel refinery (Neste), as well as Singapore government stakeholders. 2. Sharing successful and unsuccessful case studies of investment development, so that we can collectively learn and grow together. 3. Providing insights and views on the global market for liquid renewable energy.
sustainability_journey: Neste's vision of creating a healthier planet for our children excited me 6-7 years ago. Having lived in Singapore for more than a decade, I appreciate that we must all conserve and cherish what we are inheriting today, as none of it was easy to have in the past. Hence, I am committed to put the community, country and our Earth in a better state than what I found it in yesterday!
sustainable_actions: I serve as a primary consultant for developing impactful investment proposals. I am currently spearheading asset development strategies, crafting proposals to enhance business sustainability and growth for Neste's Singapore renewable fuel refineries. I also mentor junior engineers, conducting reviews, providing technical guidance, and fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement. Additionally, I have championed process improvements, streamlining operations and increasing productivity by 15%.
challenges_overcome: Even working with the world's largest renewable manufacturer, convincing internal stakeholders not to de-accelerate the mission to leave behind a healthier planet for our children can be quite challenging! A common challenge that I face is coming up with a compelling business case where stakeholders remain fully committed to either build a resilient refinery or make a change to continue producing more. Gathering factual data to sell a business case is never easy. However, I have realised that such data can often be found when talking to and engaging all your stakeholders. Hence, for me, in order to continue delivering what I enjoy, I have to keep engaging all my stakeholders (internal & external) effectively.
most_proud_of: I am most proud of my professional journey with Neste, where I learnt and contributed towards producing liquid renewable fuels which significantly reduce carbon emissions. The insights to be gained from the entire business value chain, and the challenges and opportunities to grow continue to excites me.
neste_context: Works with world's largest liquid renewable fuel refinery, involved in Singapore renewable fuel refineries development
experience: Over two decades in technical consulting, capital investment proposal development, project development, and facility planning
productivity_impact: Championed process improvements, streamlining operations and increasing productivity by 15%
